QueryResult.text: select table_name, sequence_name from user_sequences, user_triggers where instr(trigger_name, sequence_name, 1) > 0 UNION select table_name,sequence_name from user_sequences, user_tables where sequence_name like table_name || '_S%' UNION select table_name,sequence_name from user_sequences, user_tables where sequence_name like substr(table_name, 1, length(table_name)-5) || '%' and table_name like 'TEMP%' UNION select table_name, sequence_name from user_sequences, user_tables where sequence_name = 'SEQ_' || table_name
